description: This document explains the internal structure of empty interfaces (`eface`) and non-empty interfaces (`iface`) in the Go runtime.  It details the fields of `eface`, `iface`, `itab`, `interfacetype`, and `_type`, highlighting how method implementations are stored and accessed, including the handling of multiple methods via hash tables.
title: Understanding Go's `eface` and `iface`: A Deep Dive into Interface Internals
